titleStmt.title: Certayne questions demaunded and asked by the noble realme of Englande, of her true naturall chyldren and subiectes of the same

publicationStmt.publisher: At the earneste requeste and sute of youre graces trewe and faythfull seruaunt Myles Hogherde [i.e. H. Singleton?,

notesStmt.note: The imprint is sarcastic; actual place of publication and printer conjectured by and publication date from STC.
Against Mary's Catholic tendencies and her marriage to Philip of Spaine.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
